## Tables {#S:Referencing-tables}

### Using equation style referencing for handmade converted latex table

*Example. Course 3, May 2000, 19.* An insurance company sold 300 fire insurance policies as follows:   

\begin{matrix}
	\begin{array}{c c c} \hline
		\text{Number of} & \text{Policy} & \text{Probability of}\\
		\text{Policies} &  \text{Maximum} &  \text{Claim Per Policy}\\ \hline
		100 & 400 & 0.05\\
		200 & 300 & 0.06\\ \hline
		(\#eq:test)
	\end{array}
\end{matrix}

See \@ref(eq:test)
